chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 12 Pro and it has the above problem:

Face ID True Depth Camera is broken or no longer functional.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair or replacement, the 07/06/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Your deadline has expired.

Without an answer with a valid tracking link today the 14/06/2024 we will need to refund the customer on your behalf.

Thank you for understanding,
Joele from Back Market

Hello,

My product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:

I'm still waiting for my refund, because the product hasn't arrived back with me. Support is ignoring me.

Thank you very much for your help,

Dear Backcare, 

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards, 
RK
